languages.text: "В отличие от тебя я не бегу от долга. Так что сдавайся наконец и становись достойной подданной Империума".

traits.locale_text: "В отличие от тебя я не бегу от долга. Так что сдавайся наконец и становись достойной подданной Империума".

languages.text: "Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "В отличие от тебя я не бегу от долга. Так что сдавайся наконец и становись достойной подданной Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."
"Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."
"Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."
"Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."
"Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."
"Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."

languages.text: 「お前と違って、俺は義務から逃げたりはしない。そろそろ観念して、帝国の名誉ある臣民として生きることだ」
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「お前と違って、俺は義務から逃げたりはしない。そろそろ観念して、帝国の名誉ある臣民として生きることだ」

languages.text: "Im Gegensatz zu Euch laufe ich nicht vor der Pflicht davon. Ich schlage vor, Ihr gebt endlich auf und werdet zu einer ehrenwerten Untertanin des Imperiums."
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Im Gegensatz zu Euch laufe ich nicht vor der Pflicht davon. Ich schlage vor, Ihr gebt endlich auf und werdet zu einer ehrenwerten Untertanin des Imperiums."

languages.text: « Contrairement à vous, je ne fuis pas mon devoir. Je vous suggère de capituler et de devenir un honorable sujet de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Contrairement à vous, je ne fuis pas mon devoir. Je vous suggère de capituler et de devenir un honorable sujet de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: «A diferencia de usted, yo no rehuyo mi deber. Le sugiero que se resigne y se convierta en una honorable súbdita del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «A diferencia de usted, yo no rehuyo mi deber. Le sugiero que se resigne y se convierta en una honorable súbdita del Imperium».

languages.text: “我和你不一样，我从不会逃避责任。我建议你接受这一切，成为帝国的光荣臣民。”
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “我和你不一样，我从不会逃避责任。我建议你接受这一切，成为帝国的光荣臣民。”

languages.text: "Senin aksine ben görev adamıyım. İnadı bırakıp İmparatorluk'un sadık bir kulu olmanı tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Senin aksine ben görev adamıyım. İnadı bırakıp İmparatorluk'un sadık bir kulu olmanı tavsiye ederim."

languages.original_text: "Unlike you, I do not run from duty. I suggest you finally yield and become an honourable subject of the Imperium."
